meta.learningGoals: <par>In this skill you learn to <term>simplify roots</term>. An expression like <inline-math/> can for instance be written as <inline-math/> and similarly <inline-math/> is simplified to <inline-math/>. Effectively, this skill is about pulling out (or pulling in) factors from roots, including both square roots and higher-power roots. It does not include roots within roots.</par>
